entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023
